install.name: Elegentgreen
install.author: StackIdeas
install.description: Elegentgreen is a theme well suited for dark sites as it is a green theme blent into a dark gray background.

param.name: parent
param.label: Parent Theme
param.description: Specify the parent theme here. If you have specified a theme here, EasyBlog will try to inherit template files from the specific theme.

param.name: parent_css
param.label: Parent CSS
param.description: If you would like to inherit the css from a particular theme, select the theme here.

param.name: show_headers_latestentries
param.label: Show latest entries in header
param.description: If enabled, the latest entries text will be displayed on the front page.

param.name: show_author
param.label: Show posted by
param.description: If enabled, the text posted by user is visible

param.name: show_created_date
param.label: Show creation date
param.description: If enabled, the creation date will be displayed.

param.name: creation_source
param.label: Posted Date Source
param.description: Select the creation date source to use when displaying the posted date

param.name: show_category
param.label: Show category
param.description: If enabled, the category will be displayed.

param.name: show_tags
param.label: Show Tags
param.description: If enabled, the tags will be displayed.

param.name: tags_color_scheme
param.label: Tags Color Scheme
param.description: Set the color scheme for the tags.

param.name: show_tags_frontpage
param.label: Show Tags on frontpage listings
param.description: If enabled, the tags will be displayed on the front page listings, provided the option 'Show Tags' above enabled as well.

param.name: show_avatar_frontpage
param.label: Show Avatars on frontpage
param.description: If enabled, the user's avatar will be visible on the front page.

param.name: show_avatar_entry
param.label: Show Avatars on entry page
param.description: If enabled, the user's avatar will be visible on the entry page.

param.name: show_hits
param.label: Show Hits
param.description: If enabled, the hit count will appear in the blog post.

param.name: show_comments
param.label: Show Comments link
param.description: If enabled, the comment link will appear in the blog post.

param.name: show_fontchanger
param.label: Show Font Resizer
param.description: If enabled, visitors will be able to increase or decrease font sizes.

param.name: show_blogger_filterbar
param.label: Show Blogger filter bar
param.description: If enabled, user can filter to show either all bloggers or only bloggers with posts when in frontend bloggers listing page.

param.name: show_bloggerstats
param.label: Show Blogger Statistic
param.description: If enabled, blogger's statistic will be display next to blog entries in bloggers listing page.

param.name: show_bloggerstatsitem
param.label: Show Blogger's entries in Statistic
param.description: If enabled, blogger's entries will be display next to blogger statistic in bloggers listing page.

param.name: show_categorystats
param.label: Show Category Statistic
param.description: If enabled, category's statistic will be display next to blog entries in categories listing page.

param.name: show_categorystatsitem
param.label: Show Category's entries in Statistic
param.description: If enabled, category's entries will be display next to category statistic in categories listing page.

param.name: show_teamblogstats
param.label: Show TeamBlog Statistic
param.description: If enabled, teamblog's statistic will be display next to blog entries in teamblogs listing page.

param.name: show_teamblogstatsitem
param.label: Show TeamBlog's entries in Statistic
param.description: If enabled, teamblog's entries will be display next to teamblog statistic in teamblogs listing page.
